description: Are you trying to improve your writing skill in a foreign language? Activate your vocabulary with this language learning tool.
This project is built in Laravel and React using Inertia.js for seamless page transitions.

description: Find out how much Chicago buildings pollute! This public tool helps citizens understand building emissions in the city.
Built with a modern Jamstack approach using Gridsome and Vue.

sections.title: Data Sourcing
sections.text: We sourced emissions data from public records and aggregated them using Python and Pandas. The data pipeline ensures regular updates and accuracy.

sections.title: Interactive Visualization
sections.text: The front-end allows users to search, filter, and explore emissions by neighborhood or building. Performance and clarity were a top priority.
sections.alt: a screenshot of the front page of the electrify chicago project

sections.title: Open Source Collaboration
sections.text: This project was built in collaboration with local data scientists and environmental advocates. Contributions are welcome through our GitHub repository.
sections.alt: a screenshot of the front page of the electrify chicago project
